name: heat and power co-generation unit construction, 6400kW thermal, common components for heat+electricity | heat and power co-generation unit, 6400kW thermal, common components for heat+electricity | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7109/documentation

Assumed lifetime: 20 years. Operation time for heat production 2030 h/a, for electricity production 3500 h/a, calculated from reported annual production.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



This module includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the cogeneration unit: aluminium, concrete, plastics, rock wool, steel, copper. Also includes the transports of these materials, energy needed for the fabrication, the disposal of the unit.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Could be used for central European conditions.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Specific cogeneration unit installed in Switzerland.
